Docs.param: The headers retrieved from the server response stream.
The stream coming back from the transport sink.
Docs.summary: Requests asynchronous processing of a method call on the sinks in the current sink stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerResponseChannelSinkStack.AsyncProcessResponse%2A> method initializes asynchronous processing on the top sink in the current sink stack. For additional information, see the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSink.AsyncProcessResponse%2A> method.
